IncidentDef.label: Parasiticed Insect
IncidentDef.letterText: Some swarms of entity-parasitized bugs have come to your colony, and they have gone berserk from the entity's parasitism!

IncidentDef.label: Clump Assault
IncidentDef.letterText: Some hungry Clump has wandered into the vicinity of your colony. This monster of flesh and limb construction may destroy and devour everything in their sight.

IncidentDef.label: Crimson Living Fungi Arrival
IncidentDef.letterText: A monstrous living fleshy fungus creature has visited the your colony. They simply left to their own devices, releasing a strange spore of unknown flesh and blood, fungus or nanomachines, to fulfill their duty of modifying the environment.

IncidentDef.label: Strange Jellyfish Arrival
IncidentDef.letterText: Along with a psychic wave, something appears in your neighborhood. You vaguely see a floating jellyfish or jellyfish figure ...... and are clearly harbor evil designs.
